Typography

Typography should be clear and purposeful. Emphasize important information and avoid using multiple fonts and sizes to reduce confusion. We recommend using sentence case and avoiding the usage of all caps for localization and legibility.

Please use the following type ramp:

  • Title: 24/32
    Segoe UI Semilight / SemiBold

    Reserved for headers.

  • Title2: 18/24
    Segoe UI Semilight / SemiBold

    Reserved for text in dialog titles, headers in tabs, and headers in cards.

  • Base: 14/20
    Segoe UI Regular / Italic / SemiBold / Bold

    Main body text is mainly displayed in $app-black or $app-gray-02.
    Bold text denotes activity while semibold text is generally used for subhead sections.

  • Caption: 12/16
    Segoe UI Regular / Italic / SemiBold / Bold

    Secondary text is mainly displayed in $app-black or $app-gray-02.
    Bold text denotes activity while semibold text is generally used for subhead sections.

  • X-Small: 10/12
    Segoe UI Regular

    Reserved for navigation labels and used sparingly.
